summary: Who's been decapitating the innocent girls at a local night school? The police are baffled.

Sicari|Nick Cairis|Karen MacDonald|Annette Miller|Bill McCann|Margo Skinner|Elizabeth Barnitz|Holly Hardman|Meb Boden|Leonard Corman|Belle McDonald|Edward C. title: Psicosis 2
